statements: SELECT * FROM user_information;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_information;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM user_information;
SELECT * FROM user_information WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_information WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM user_information WHERE username = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT username FROM user_information WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT phone_number, email FROM user_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_information ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email, location FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY location DESC, username;
SELECT DISTINCT location, count(*) FROM users GROUP BY location HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT u.username, p.preference_name, p.preference_value FROM users u INNER JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.preference_name = 'theme' AND p.preference_value = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, preferred_language FROM user_preferences WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, preferred_language, subscription_status FROM user_preferences WHERE email_notifications = true;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT full_name, age FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences;
SELECT message_text, target_user_id FROM marketing_messages;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT message_id, message_text, target_user_id FROM marketing_messages WHERE message_id > 5;
SELECT username, email, full_name, age, gender FROM users JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, marketing_emails, marketing_sms FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com'
SELECT user_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_id, marketing_emails, marketing_sms, marketing_push_notifications FROM user_preferences
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2021-05-01'
